title: Understanding the Anode Reaction
text: In a galvanic cell, the anode is where oxidation occurs. Look at the Zn anode in the image. What happens to Zn at the anode?

title: Oxidation Process
text: Oxidation involves the loss of electrons. Consider how Zn changes its form at the anode.

title: Write the Oxidation Reaction
text: Write the reaction for Zn losing electrons at the anode.
